sentences.en: Reenact this scene from memory with the same or random participants.
sentences.cn: 请原班人马或其他人根据记忆重演这个段子.

sentences.en: The key lies in our reactions — how we reenact , or restructure internally, what others say and do.
sentences.cn: 重点在于我们的反应---我们如何再制定及如何在在内心重建别人所说的和所做的.

words.tran_cn: 重新制定；再扮演；再制定
